page.title: 11MONYASH WOMEN'S INSTITUTE
page.content: The{W.I.}is an oganisation to get local women to meet.The{W.I.}in Monyash was started by{Miss Makinson (an infant teacher at the local school) in 1927. The motto of the{W.I.}is:{"Do all {the good you can,in all the ways you {can,to all the people you can." There are currently 14 members.If more members joined they would be able to go on more trips.They meet twice-a- month in the{Village Hall}.Each meeting lasts for 2-3 hours.They have demonstrations (hairdressing,flower- arranging,crochet) and speeches on different subjects.They raise money for charity.There is an Annual General Meeting every year in the{Albert Hall, {London.
